snippet: “Devouring Devouring” is the choreographer Netta Yerushalmy’s bid to mix New York and Tel Aviv sensibilities.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews performance of Netta Yerushalmy piece Devouring Devouring at the Ellen Stewart Theater at La MaMa.
lead_paragraph: “Devouring Devouring” is the choreographer Netta Yerushalmy’s bid to mix New York and Tel Aviv sensibilities.

headline.seo: ‘Devouring Devouring’ at La MaMa’s Ellen Stewart Theater
headline.main: An Awkward, Articulate Pose by Way of Tel Aviv and Manhattan
headline.print_headline: An Awkward, Articulate Pose by Way of Tel Aviv and Manhattan
